rule: Cats are the descendants of the gods.

dialogues.AniD1: Cats understand life better than most people, food, sunlight and liesure.
dialogues.AniD2: Cats are the closest relatives of the gods, divinity may be found in a kittens purr.
dialogues.AniD3: When the first cat rightfully devoured the first fish an age of conflict was spawned.
dialogues.AniD4: Sun upon the belly is a form of worship all of its own.
